00052 #ifndef _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MESSAGE_H
00053 #define _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MESSAGE_H
00054 
00055 #include <ethercattype.h>
00056 #include <string>
00057 #include <time.h>
00058 
00059 namespace youbot {
00060 
00061   /// Output part from the EtherCat message of the youBot EtherCat slaves
00062 
00063   struct SlaveMessageOutput {
00064     int32 value;
00065     uint8 controllerMode;
00066   } __attribute__((__packed__));
00067 
00068 
00069   /// Input part from the EtherCat message of the youBot EtherCat slaves
00070 
00071   struct SlaveMessageInput {
00072     int32 actualPosition;   // encoder ticks
00073     int32 actualCurrent;    // mA
00074     int32 actualVelocity;   // rpm motor axis
00075     uint32 errorFlags;
00076     int32 actualPWM;
00077   } __attribute__((__packed__));
00078 
00079   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00080   /// EtherCat message of the youBot EtherCat slaves
00081   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00082   class YouBotSlaveMsg {
00083   public:
00084 
00085 
00086     SlaveMessageOutput stctOutput;
00087     SlaveMessageInput stctInput;
00088     unsigned int jointNumber;
00089 
00090     // Constructor
00091 
00092     YouBotSlaveMsg() {
00093       stctOutput.controllerMode = 0;
00094       stctOutput.value = 0;
00095       stctInput.actualCurrent = 0;
00096       stctInput.actualPosition = 0;
00097       stctInput.actualVelocity = 0;
00098       stctInput.actualPWM = 0;
00099       stctInput.errorFlags = 0;
00100       jointNumber = 0;
00101     }
00102 
00103     // Copy-Constructor
00104 
00105     YouBotSlaveMsg(const YouBotSlaveMsg &copy) {
00106       stctOutput = copy.stctOutput;
00107       stctInput = copy.stctInput;
00108       jointNumber = copy.jointNumber;
00109     }
00110 
00111     // Destructor
00112 
00113     ~YouBotSlaveMsg() {
00114     }
00115 
00116     // assignment operator
00117 
00118     YouBotSlaveMsg & operator=(const YouBotSlaveMsg &copy) {
00119       stctOutput = copy.stctOutput;
00120       stctInput = copy.stctInput;
00121       jointNumber = copy.jointNumber;
00122 
00123       return *this;
00124     }
00125   };
00126 
00127 } // namespace youbot
00128 
00129 #endif  /* _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MESSAGE_H */
